name: Basic Skating 101
description: Learn the basics of standing and gliding on ice. Safe for absolute beginners.

name: Pro Hockey Training
description: Intensive training for hockey athletes focusing on agility and shooting accuracy.

name: Friday Ice Disco
description: An exciting night with disco lights and a live DJ on the ice!
requirements: Bring as many friends as you can!

name: Figure Skating Comp
description: Intermediate level figure skating competition showcasing artistic skills.

name: Toddler Glide Session
description: Gentle introduction to ice for children aged 3-5 using penguin skating aids.

name: Ice Cardio Blast
description: High-intensity interval training on ice to build stamina and leg strength.

name: Speed Skating Qualifier
description: Time-trial race for advanced speed skaters qualifying for regional team.

name: Couples Date Night
description: Romantic skating session with slow music and warm beverages included.

name: Curling Taster Class
description: Learn the strategy and technique of curling stone throwing and sweeping.

name: Advanced Spin Clinic
description: Specialized clinic focusing on sit spins, camel spins, and axel preparation.
requirements: Must be able to perform a scratch spin.

name: Corporate Ice Challenge
description: Teambuilding games on ice including relay races and human bowling.
